sys_soap_message_function.envelope:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:ezwim:esmorderservice"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <urn:createOrder soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/">
<object xsi:type="xsd:string">ORDER</object> <sysid xsi:type="xsd:string">${sys_id}</sysid> <number xsi:type="xsd:string">${number}</number> <short_description xsi:type="xsd:string">${short_description}</short_description> <comments xsi:type="xsd:string">${comments}</comments> <requested_for xsi:type="xsd:string">${requested_for}</requested_for>
<priority xsi:type="xsd:string">${priority}</priority> <impact xsi:type="xsd:string">${impact}</impact> <urgency xsi:type="xsd:string">${urgency}</urgency> <due_date xsi:type="xsd:string">${due_date}</due_date>
<state xsi:type="xsd:string">${state}</state> <stage xsi:type="xsd:string">${stage}</stage> <request_state xsi:type="xsd:string">${request_state}</request_state>
<delivery_address xsi:type="xsd:string">${delivery_address}</delivery_address> <price xsi:type="xsd:string">${price}</price> <special_instructions xsi:type="xsd:string">${special_instructions}</special_instructions>
<approval xsi:type="xsd:string">${approval}</approval> <upon_reject xsi:type="xsd:string">${upon_reject}</upon_reject> <upon_approval xsi:type="xsd:string">${upon_approval}</upon_approval>
<sys_domain_path xsi:type="xsd:string">${sys_domain_path}</sys_domain_path> <sys_class_name xsi:type="xsd:string">${sys_class_name}</sys_class_name>
<devices xsi:type="xsd:string">${devices}</devices>
</urn:createOrder> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
